mutants.code:
def find_nth_dish(N, K, L):
    L += 1
    digits = []
    while L:
        digits.append(int(L % K))
        L //= K
    digits = digits[::-1]
    digits = [1] * (N - len(digits)) + [1 + i for i in digits]
    return digits
